sourcesContent:
<template>
  <base-card>
    <base-button
      @click="setSelectedTab('all-bootcamps')"
      :mode="allBootcampsBtnMode"
      >Bootcamps</base-button
    >
    <base-button
      @click="setSelectedTab('add-bootcamp')"
      :mode="addBootcampBtnMode"
      >Add a bootcamp</base-button
    >
  </base-card>
  <component :is="selectedTab" @aNewBootcamp="addNewBootcamp"></component>
</template>

<script>
import AllBootcamps from './AllBootcamps.vue';
import AddBootcamp from './AddBootcamp.vue';

export default {
  components: {
    AllBootcamps,
    AddBootcamp,
  },
  data() {
    return {
      selectedTab: '',
      bootcamps: [
        {
          name: 'frontend-bootcamps',
          description: 'a complete frontend bootcamps',
          phone: '0789878719',
          email: 'frontend@gmail.com',
          website: 'http://frontend.com',
          address: 'douai',
        },
        {
          name: 'backend-bootcamps',
          description: 'a complete backend bootcamps',
          phone: '0789878723',
          email: 'backend@gmail.com',
          website: 'http://backend.com',
          address: 'lille',
        },
      ],
    };
  },
  provide() {
    return {
      bootcamps: this.bootcamps,
    };
  },
  computed: {
    allBootcampsBtnMode() {
      return this.selectedTab === 'all-bootcamps' ? 'selected' : null;
    },
    addBootcampBtnMode() {
      return this.selectedTab === 'add-bootcamp' ? 'selected' : null;
    },
  },
  methods: {
    setSelectedTab(tab) {
      this.selectedTab = tab;
    },
    addNewBootcamp() {
      
    }
  },
};
</script>
